statements: SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal';
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_id FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type IS NOT NULL;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY material_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 123 AND material_type = 'Plastic';
SELECT material_id, material_name, supplier_id FROM materials WHERE material_type LIKE '%wood%' ORDER BY material_name ASC, supplier_id DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE supplier_id IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_name LIKE 'Steel%' OR material_type = 'Rubber';
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials WHERE quantity > 0;
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, address FROM suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 5
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE supplier_id IS NULL
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, quantity FROM materials JOIN suppliers ON materials.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 1;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM materials JOIN material_supplier ON materials.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN suppliers ON material_supplier.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC;
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal' ORDER BY material_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM materials ORDER BY material_name DESC, material_type ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, price FROM materials JOIN material_supplier ON materials.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN suppliers ON material_supplier.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE material_type = 'Metal' AND price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, price FROM materials JOIN material_supplier ON materials.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN suppliers ON material_supplier.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_location = 'New York' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC, price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT supplier_id) AS total_suppliers, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM material_supplier;

SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location, price FROM materials JOIN material_supplier ON materials.material_id = material_supplier.material_id JOIN suppliers ON material_supplier.supplier_id = suppliers.supplier_id WHERE supplier_location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY material_name ASC, price ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_phone FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT material_name, price FROM materials WHERE price < 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT * FROM material_supplier WHERE material_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM materials WHERE quantity < 100 AND price < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT ms.material_id, s.supplier_name FROM material_supplier ms JOIN suppliers s ON ms.supplier_id = s.supplier_id;

SELECT a.architect_name, m.material_name, ms.quantity FROM architects a JOIN material_supplier ms ON a.architect_id = ms.material_id JOIN materials m ON ms.material_id = m.material_id WHERE ms.quantity > 10;

SELECT s.supplier_name, m.material_name, ms.quantity, ms.price FROM suppliers s JOIN material_supplier ms ON s.supplier_id = ms.supplier_id JOIN materials m ON ms.material_id = m.material_id WHERE ms.quantity * ms.price > 100;
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM suppliers
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects
SELECT material_id, material_name, material_type FROM materials
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials ORDER BY material_type ASC
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01'

SELECT projects.project_name, materials.material_name, project_materials.quantity FROM projects JOIN project_materials ON projects.project_id = project_materials.project_id JOIN materials ON project_materials.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE materials.material_type = 'Metal'

SELECT suppliers.supplier_name, materials.material_name, material_supplier.material_id FROM suppliers JOIN material_supplier ON suppliers.supplier_id = material_supplier.supplier_id JOIN materials ON material_supplier.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE suppliers.supplier_location = 'New York'
